channel.title: Documentation on BornAgain
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on BornAgain

item.title: BornAgain reference paper appeared in J. Appl. Cryst.
item.description: BornAgain reference paper appeared in J. Appl. Cryst. Our paper BornAgain: software for simulating and fitting grazing-incidence small-angle scattering has appeared in the February 2020 issue of Journal of Applied Crystallography. The paper gives a broad overview over the scope of BornAgain, the software architecture, and the modelled physics. For years to come, it will be the canonical reference for BornAgain.
